# How to get an update on progress

To get an update on your claim or progress it, [sign in to the 'Money claims' service](https://www.moneyclaims.service.gov.uk) using your email address and the password you created when you created your account.

You can [request a new password](https://hmcts-access.service.gov.uk/reset/forgotpassword) if you need to.

# How to respond to a money claim made against you

**If you choose not to challenge the claim**

You should pay the full amount directly to the person who made the claim. You don't need to use the 'Money claims' service to do this.

**If you want to challenge the claim**

[Sign in to the 'Money claims' service](https://www.gov.uk/respond-money-claim) to:

* ask for more time to respond
* offer to pay a lesser amount
* dispute some or all of the claim
* dispute the claim and make a counter-claim

You'll need your claim number and security code from the notice you received. You may also have to pay a fee.
If this doesn't answer your query, you should continue and submit the form.
